description.codeDtlName: Expiration date (or expiration date after opening)
description.itemCont: Within 36 months after manufacture, 12 months after opening
Apply an appropriate amount of the product to the lips from the inner size outwards.

1. Consult a specialist if you have abnormal symptoms or side effects such as a skin rash, swelling, or itchiness during use or from exposure to direct sunlight after use.
2. Do not use on wounds or other affected areas.
3. Cautions for Storage and Handling
a) Keep out of reach of children.
b) Keep away from direct sunlight.
If any defects are found, an exchange or compensation is provided according to the criteria for the settlement of consumer disputes notified publicly by the Fair Trade Commission.
